item.title: 10 Very Promising Open Source Projects You haven’t Heard of - YouTube
item.description: 10 Very Promising Open Source Projects You haven’t Heard of - YouTube 0:25 - The Fuck 0:48 - Partytown 1:20 - SuperTokens 1:48 - Hi Mom 2:08 - Meilisearch and Zinc Search Engine 2:29 - tRCP, tPRC, [[tRPC]] 3:12 - NocoDB 3:31 - Hoppscotch 3:55 - DanfoJS 4:22 - Mantine 4:59 - Amplication

item.title: Cryptocurrency Applications
item.description: Cryptocurrency Applications Incorrectly used as a [[Store of Value]], but the underlying technology still works. Some applications: Protection from Authoritian Regimes [[Crypto as Protection From Authoritarianism]] [[NFTs]] Can be more than just art Tokens for special privileges Protect from Big Tech overreach Membership outside of Imagine being integrated across Apple Podcasts, Spotify, etc.
